text: Yves Fromion (born September 15, 1941) was a member of the National Assembly of France. He represented Cher department's 1st constituency from 1997 to 2017 as a member of the Union for a Popular Movement. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Yves Fromion
